notes: Design validated: Critical issues resolved (Python recording prohibition via static analysis + pre-commit hooks, hybrid model distribution strategy with on-demand download + system shared path, IPC versioning with strict backward compatibility). ADRs created: ADR-001 (recording responsibility), ADR-002 (model distribution), ADR-003 (IPC versioning). CI/CD setup: pre-commit hooks + forbidden imports check script. Ready for /kiro:spec-tasks.
